Title: Signup (Email/Password)
Description: Create account form with username/email/password and session cookie
AcceptanceCriteria: Given valid inputs When submit Then session set and onboarding loads

Title: Login (Email/Password)
AcceptanceCriteria: Given valid credentials When submit Then home loads with no error

Title: Onboarding Info
Description: Form for age/gender/baseline HR and daily stress rating
AcceptanceCriteria: Given values When save Then profile updates and home loads

Title: Dashboard Layout
Description: Header + Pet + Trend + Coach + Readings cards
AcceptanceCriteria: Given dashboard When render Then all cards visible without layout overflow

Title: Add Test Reading
Description: Button to simulate a reading and POST to backend
AcceptanceCriteria: Given click When POST Then new reading appears in list and chart

Title: Trend Bars (BPM)
Description: Render last 20 BPM as bars with hover tooltips
AcceptanceCriteria: Given ≥20 readings When open Then 20 bars render with correct values

Title: HRV Sparkline
Description: Render HRV mini-chart in Trends screen
AcceptanceCriteria: Given HRV data When open Then sparkline matches raw values ±1

Title: Breathing Coach
AcceptanceCriteria: Given start When timer completes Then streak increments and overlay closes

Title: Calm Streak
AcceptanceCriteria: Given completion When recorded Then streak shows increased count

Title: Theme Toggle
AcceptanceCriteria: Given toggle When switch Then theme persists across pages

Title: Export CSV
AcceptanceCriteria: Given readings When export Then CSV downloads with headers ts,bpm,hrv

Title: Error Handling
Description: Inline errors for auth and API failures
AcceptanceCriteria: Given failure When occurs Then inline error shows and no crash

Title: CORS/Cookies Config
Description: Configure SameSite Lax and allowed origins
AcceptanceCriteria: Given frontend origin When request Then response readable and session maintained
